name: accounting-mysql
description: Income Statement ------------------------- - You can read record - You can add record - You can edit record - You can delete record

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --names " server client " "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.install: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names " front back main " "npm run front" "npm run back" "npm run main"
scripts.i: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names " front back " "npm run front" "npm run back"
